title: The Blue Lagoon (Greek Subs).mkv
description:
"The Blue Lagoon (1980)",  "H GALAZIA LIMNH" me Greek Subs

Toy Randal Kleiser me toys: Brooke Shields and Christopher Atkins. 
H tainia poy prokalese polles antidraseis gia tis gymnes skines anamesa se dyo efiva paidia, poy navagisan se paidikh ilikia se ena tropiko nisi ki ekei emathan thn ..epiviosh thn agaph k thn omorfia toy erota makria apo tis apagorefseis kai thn ...ypokrisia ths  koinonias
H kalyterh skini pistevo pos einai pros to telos (1.30') otan oi efivoi gyrisan thn plath stoys "sotires" toys,  fovoymenoi mh xasoyn ton Paradeiso toys.  
104 "Xalara" lepta poy tha mas taxidepsoyn sto tropiko nisi me  omorfes eikones k skines apo tin istoria ton navagon.
Mia tainia poy vlepetai efxarista kai antexei sto xrono.
Kalh Theash kai EFXARISTO PROKATAVOLIKA gia to SEED!!
